columns.name: name
columns.description: A friendly name that identifies an API management service.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify an API management service uniquely.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The current provisioning state of the API management service. Possible values include: 'Created', 'Activating', 'Succeeded', 'Updating', 'Failed', 'Stopped', 'Terminating', 'TerminationFailed', 'Deleted'.

columns.name: type
columns.description: Type of the resource.

columns.name: created_at_utc
columns.description: Creation UTC date of the API management service.

columns.name: developer_portal_url
columns.description: Developer Portal endpoint URL of the API management service.

columns.name: disable_gateway
columns.description: Property only valid for an API management service deployed in multiple locations. This can be used to disable the gateway in master region.

columns.name: enable_client_certificate
columns.description: Property only meant to be used for Consumption SKU Service. This enforces a client certificate to be presented on each request to the gateway. This also enables the ability to authenticate the certificate in the policy on the gateway.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: An unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

columns.name: gateway_regional_url
columns.description: Gateway URL of the API management service in the default region.

columns.name: gateway_url
columns.description: Gateway URL of the API management service.

columns.name: identity_principal_id
columns.description: The principal id of the identity.

columns.name: identity_tenant_id
columns.description: The client tenant id of the identity.

columns.name: identity_type
columns.description: The type of identity used for the resource.

columns.name: management_api_url
columns.description: Management API endpoint URL of the API management service.

columns.name: notification_sender_email
columns.description: Email address from which the notification will be sent.

columns.name: portal_url
columns.description: Publisher portal endpoint URL of the API management service.

columns.name: publisher_email
columns.description: Publisher email of the API management service.

columns.name: publisher_name
columns.description: Publisher name of the API management service.

columns.name: restore
columns.description: Undelete API management service if it was previously soft-deleted.

columns.name: scm_url
columns.description: SCM endpoint URL of the API management service.

columns.name: sku_capacity
columns.description: Capacity of the SKU (number of deployed units of the SKU)

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: Name of the Sku

columns.name: target_provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the API management service, which is targeted by the long running operation started on the service.

columns.name: virtual_network_configuration_subnet_name
columns.description: The name of the subnet.

columns.name: virtual_network_configuration_subnet_resource_id
columns.description: The full resource ID of a subnet in a virtual network to deploy the API Management service in.

columns.name: virtual_network_configuration_id
columns.description: The virtual network ID.

columns.name: virtual_network_type
columns.description: The type of VPN in which API management service needs to be configured in. None (Default Value) means the API management service is not part of any Virtual Network, External means the API management deployment is set up inside a Virtual Network having an Internet Facing Endpoint, and Internal means that API management deployment is setup inside a Virtual Network having an Intranet Facing Endpoint only. Possible values include: 'None', 'External', 'Internal'

columns.name: additional_locations
columns.description: Additional datacenter locations of the API management service.

columns.name: api_version_constraint
columns.description: Control plane APIs version constraint for the API management service.

columns.name: certificates
columns.description: List of certificates that need to be installed in the API management service.

columns.name: custom_properties
columns.description: Custom properties of the API management service.

columns.name: diagnostic_settings
columns.description: A list of active diagnostic settings for the API management service.

columns.name: host_name_configurations
columns.description: Custom hostname configuration of the API management service.

columns.name: identity_user_assigned_identities
columns.description: The list of user identities associated with the resource.

columns.name: private_ip_addresses
columns.description: Private static load balanced IP addresses of the API management service in primary region which is deployed in an internal virtual network. Available only for 'Basic', 'Standard', 'Premium' and 'Isolated' SKU.

columns.name: public_ip_addresses
columns.description: Public static load balanced IP addresses of the API management service in primary region. Available only for 'Basic', 'Standard', 'Premium' and 'Isolated' SKU.

columns.name: zones
columns.description: A list of availability zones denoting where the resource needs to come from.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
